From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

"Yes, and it is ussually good strategy to have proper fortifications.
Something we do not have." He turned his attention to Astrotrain.
"Astrotrain, you will lead an outing party to the Azores Islands, where
the Predacons landed their ship, and retrieve it. Contact me once you
have." he ordered.
